item.title: Shares of this under-the-radar weight-loss drug play could double, says Leerink Partners

item.title: What Wall Street is expecting from Apple's iPhone event
item.description: Wall Street is looking to see if Apple's iPhone launch on Tuesday could spark sales and renew investor enthusiasm on the beaten-down stock.

item.title: CoreWeave shares jump after it starts VC fund to invest in AI companies
item.description: The company, which itself is backed by Nvidia, is the latest example of a tech giant turning to the growing world of AI startups.
